Hero content does not autoplay (Hide Spoilers is ON and Autoplay is OFF)
Hero content autoplays (Hide Spoiler is OFF Autoplay is ON)

Verify that you can add and watch four screens at once in multiview
Verify that you can remove screens from multiview
Verify audio changes when focus shifts to different tile
Multiview: Selecting and clicking a secondary screen becomes the primary screen
custom_preconds:
1. App is installed, up and running.
2. User is logged into with proper entitlements.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page and start playing a game.
2. Add a secondary game
custom_expected: 1. Select and click the secondary game, it'll switch to primary screen.

title: Verify correct display of message for adding more than four screens
custom_preconds:
1. App is installed, up and running.
2. User is logged in with proper entitlements.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page and start playing a game.
2. Once the game is up and running add another VOD or SVOD in the Multiview. Max of 4 can be added.
custom_expected:
Should see:
 "Multiview supports a max of 4 streams. Please remove a stream before adding a new one."
See attached screenshot
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13893443)

title: Verify correct display of prompts in top right when focus moves
custom_preconds:
1. App is installed, up and running.
2. User is logged in with proper entitlements.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page and start playing a game.
2. Once the game is up and running add another VOD or SVOD in the Multiview.
custom_expected:
Should see:
 - GO FULL SCREEN
 - REMOVE GAME
 - EXIT MULTIVIEW
See attached screenshot
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13893442)

title: Verify that user can add VOD and SVOD to multiview
custom_preconds:
1. App is installed, up and running.
2. User is logged in with proper entitlements.
Note: Keep in mind that only the focused window will have the audio.
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page and start playing a game.
2. Once the game is up and running add another VOD or SVOD in the Multiview.
custom_expected: Multiple feeds should now be on your screen.

title: Verify Today button
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Games Page.
2. Select and click the calendar icon on the top right corner of the screen.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875080)
custom_expected:
You'll see the "Today" button on the top right corner of the screen.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875079)

title: Verify Calendar layout English/ Spanish
custom_steps:
1. Click and select the calendar icon on the Games page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875123)
custom_expected:
You'll see the calendar layout
English
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875124)

Spanish
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875125)

title: Able to select and click a particular date
custom_preconds: You are on the Games page
custom_steps:
1. Select and click on the calendar icon

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875168)

2. Click on any date

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875169)
custom_expected:
Should see the game tile for the day you have selected. In this case I've selected November 3

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875170)

title: Verify default focused state upon clicking on calendar icon
custom_steps:
1. Select and click on calendar icon

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875171)
custom_expected:
Should take you to the current date. For example if it's November 18 today it should automatically land on the day.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875172)

title: MLBN Paywall message (not logged in)
custom_expected:
You'll see this message if you are not logged in **MLB Network requires a MLB.tv account and a pay TV subscription.**

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875174)

title: MLBN Hero (logged in with Unauth with MVPD account)
custom_preconds: Logged in with a free account
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to MLB Network Page 
2. Click on Log in to TV Provider 
3. Get MLB Network
custom_expected:
1. You'll see two buttons "Log in to TV Provider" and "Get MLB Network"

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875175)

2. Clicking on Log in to TV Provider will take you to next screen where you'll see QR code

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875176)

3. Clicking on Get MLB Network will take you Get MLB Network page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13875177)

Login/ Log Out
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. See the first option.
custom_expected:
If you are logged in you will see Log Out 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13879402)

and if you are Logged in you will see Log In
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13879403)

title: Favorite Team
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select the second "Favorite Team"
3. Click on it and select your favorite team and click Done
4. Navigate back to the Settings page and your favorite team will appear right next to your login info.
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13884678)

Select your favorite team and click Done
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13884680)

It'll appear on the Settings page.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13884681)

title: Followed Teams
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select the second "Followed Team".
3. Click on the teams you want to follow then click Done.
4. Navigate back to the Settings page and your favorite team will appear right next to your login info.
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13884684)

Select your followed team and click Done.
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13884683)

title: Hide Spoilers On
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select Hide Spoilers.
3. Click on it and and set it to ON.
4. Navigate to Home or Games page and observe that Game tiles says "Hide Spoilers ON"
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887944)

Game tile will show "Hide Spoilers ON"
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887945)

title: Autoplay Featured Content
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select Autoplay Featured Content and set it to On.
3. Navigate to Home page and observe that hero content will start autoplay. And vice-versa if you set it to Off (you'll see a static image).
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887946)

Hero is autoplaying
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887947)

Hero with static image when autoplay is set to Off
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887948)

title: Select App Start View: Home
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select and click Select App Start View and set it to Home
3. Quit then restart the App and you will observe that app is now launches on Home page.
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887949)

Quit and relaunch will launch the app on Home page.

title: Select App Start View: Games
custom_steps:
1. Navigate to the Settings page.
2. Select and click Select App Start View and set it to Games
3. Quit then restart the App and you will observe that app is now launches on Games page.
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13887950)


Quit and relaunch will launch the app on Games page.
